contest-event.event-date:
March 5, 1938 D City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (4th Section)
City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (Fourth Section) 40 Test Piece Contest City of Leicester Brass Band Festival city-of-leicester-brass-band-festival-4th-section
Wayside Scenes
De Montfort Hall, Leicester, Leicestershire, England, UK Musical Progress and Mail March 1938 page 123 gives the result as recorded above, however Brass Band News April 1938 shows that the fifth prize was won by Lilleshall Colliery conducted by J.Rigby. Further confirmation from a separate source would be appreciated. 16 bands competed
Jan. 20, 2014, 10:37 a.m. March 19, 2020, 9:26 p.m.
1 West Bromwich Borough J. H. Boffy
2 Grantham Concert Band H. C. Sales
3 Swanwick Collieries Junior Reg Little
4 Sileby Town Silver J. Smith
5 Lilleshall Collieries Fred Mortimer
6 Earl Shilton Britannia H. Bee
